languageModelTools.name: getCurrentTime
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns the current date and time. Use this tool when you need to know the current time, date, or timestamp. The tool can format the output in 12-hour or 24-hour format and optionally include timezone information. Always use this tool to get the current time rather than assuming the time.

format.description: The time format to use. Use '12h' for 12-hour format with AM/PM, or '24h' for 24-hour format. Defaults to '12h'.

includeTimezone.description: Whether to include timezone information in the output. Defaults to true.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
